newsitem.title: JAPAN: Daiei says to brief media on buying Yaohan outlets.
newsitem.headline: Daiei says to brief media on buying Yaohan outlets.

text.p: Daiei Inc said on Monday that it and Yaohan Japan would hold a news conference at 5 p.m. (0800 GMT) in Tokyo on its purchase of some of Yaohan"s retail outlets.
Yaohan Japan, the flagship firm of the Yaohan international retailing group, has been burdened with hefty borrowings after aggressive expansion.
Earlier this month the supermarket chain operator announced restructuring plans which included selling some of its stores in Japan.
The company has also sought assistance from banks to raise operating funds.
